title: space bar / tab spam in champ select bug
body: um so i was spamming said button then the mysteries page popped up and i tried closing them but a brownish box stayed there over all the champions and i couldn't select a champion in ranked. and i was just wondering if this bug was known because bugs like this kinda seem to stay in the game for a long time.

replies.body:
Bug reports go [here](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new). But if it's only affecting you, then you want to bring it up on this board.

Are you able to replicate it, and provide the exact conditions?
